import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Parallax } from 'react-scroll-parallax'; import { DataContext } from '../pages/_app' import Image from './Image' import Section from './Section' import CountBar from './CountBar' const NationalTeam = () => { const { nationalTeam, labels } = useContext(DataContext) const { copy, image, assistsCount, gamesCount, goalsCount, startYear, endYear, playerNumber, position } = nationalTeam return (

{ copy }

{ startYear }-{ endYear }
{ position } #{ playerNumber }
) } export default NationalTeam;
